articles.title: Amy Schumer gives a glimpse into her 'lonely battle' with endometriosis in new interview - Daily Mail
articles.description: Amy Schumer, 41, has delved into her history with  endometriosis in a new interview. She had her uterus and appendix removed in 2021 to help treat the painful condition.
